Reviews.Title: “Not child/ baby friendly”
Reviews.Author: Morgs2010
Reviews.Content: husband 8 month baby recently stayed medina harbourside booking online phoned hotel directly request portacot informed pay additional 5 night cot bit steep considering hotels provide complimentary portacot nevertheless agreed paying 5 booked paid line arrived portacot wasnt set 30mins waiting hungry tired baby staff arrived set cot bed left inspected cot realise mattress didnt belong cot meant 10cm gap mattress rock hard phoned reception explained requested cot blanket pad mattress cot arrived probably 20 mins appeared 80s corners torn mattress meant child baby easily leg arm caught huge safety risk decided phone reception advised reception checking informed note apology nor 5 refunded noticed stay grass hadnt cut pool pool freezing cold website claimed heated pool pool unkept overall stay disappointing sleepless night checking baby hadnt fallen holes portacot recommend

HotelInfo.Name: Medina Grand Harbourside
HotelInfo.Address: 55 Shelley St | King Street Wharf, Sydney, New South Wales 2000, Australia
